name: solstice-protocol-monorepo
description: Zero-knowledge identity verification protocol on Solana

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:circuits && npm run install:contracts
scripts.install:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && cd frontend && npm install @coral-xyz/anchor
scripts.setup:env: cp backend/.env.example backend/.env && cp frontend/.env.example frontend/.env
scripts.setup:db: psql -c 'CREATE DATABASE solstice_protocol;' && psql solstice_protocol < backend/src/db/schema.sql

author: Solstice Protocol Team
